I've always lived in the moment.
Discipline is the mark of intelligent living.
The least deviation from truth will be multiplied later.
Success is not what you do when you are on top.  Success is how high you bounce when you hit the bottom.
People acting together as a group can accomplish things which no individual acting alone could ever hope to bring about.
If you want something new, you have to stop doing something old.
Whether you have a problem in your life or not depends upon your own attitude, your own understanding.
Words are the clothing of our thoughts.
Life is a question and how we live it is our answer.
Live your life as an exclamation rather than an explanation.
You can have it all. You just can't have it all at once.
Move out of your comfort zone. You can only grow if you are willing to feel awkward and uncomfortable when you try something new.
You don't get in life what you want; you get in life what you are.
Every traveler has a home of his own, and he learns to appreciate it the more from his wandering.
He is not a lover who does not love forever.
Throw your heart over the bar and your body will follow.
The degree of responsibility you take for your life determines how much change you can create in it.
We can either add to our character each day, or we can fritter away our energies in distractions.
When a man is penalized for honesty he learns to lie.
When you win, say nothing, when you lose say less.

Instead of thinking about what you are going to do when you retire, think about how you can do that now and make a living from it.
All you need is passion. If you have a passion for something, you'll create the talent.
The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
You can't climb the ladder of success with your hands in your pockets.
If no one ever broke the rules, then we'd never advance.
Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you've imagined.
The future doesn't belong to the faint-hearted; it belongs to the brave.
Leaders think and talk about solutions. Followers think and talk about the problems.
Being spiritual has nothing to do with what you believe and everything to do with your state of consciousness.
Life is like playing the violin in public and learning the instrument as one goes on.
Sadness is but a wall between two gardens.
If you spend too much time thinking about a thing, you'll never get it done.
Life is what you make it. Always has been, always will be.
There is an essence of when you are fearless, you become more creative.

Youth has no age.
Every failure brings with it the seed of an equivalent success.

Don't give up the fight, Stand up for your rights.

Character is doing what you don't want to do but know you should do.
